ag:
Breto is a [virtual MIDI controller] which allows for making complex annotations to audio samples. The annotated samples can then be arranged into an outline format within Breto, and played back. It's a great help for making podcasts, mixes, radio programmes, ambitious audio montage, mocking up complex long-duration compositions, or simply demoing variations of your next album's track list.

COMING SOON
bf:
Real-time audio outliner for podcasts, documentary, montage
Full DAW integration
bi: desktop-mobile-apps, javascript, react, electron, sound, composition
